name: df-vdwap
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cvdwa, cmpt(s0, cn0, cmpo(s1, s2, cn, cn, crn(cmpt(s3, co(nat0, cfz, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s1), caddc, co(cv(s3), cmul, cv(s2))))))))
comment: Define the arithmetic progression function, which takes as input a length ` k ` , a start point ` a ` , and a step ` d ` and outputs the set of points in this progression. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Aug-2014.)
